name: Fathom Pass
description:
Warning: The story of this game is relatively dark and features alcohol, violence and murder.

There is a new teletext episode of Adventures of Mysterious Knight so grab your TV remote, sit back and relax.

Fathom Pass is short grim “visual” novel stylized as old TV teletext system with voice over made in 48 hours for LD 48.

Controls: Mouse with on-screen TV remote sprite or keyboard.
